repos.name: ids_please
repos.description: Helps to get IDs or screen names from links to social network accounts

repos.name: inoERP
repos.description: inoERP is a php based open source enterprise management system. The ERP systems contain all the functionalities required for running any manufacturing, service or distribution organization. The features are very similar to Oracle R12/ Fusion Application and SAP. It also contains a light weight CMS which seamlessly integrates with the ERP.
